articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: BCCI Unlikely To Support Asia Cup Hybrid Model, Final Decision At ACC Meeting: Report - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The ACC executive body has 25 members -- 5 Test-playing nations (India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka and Afghanistan), 3 with ODI and T20I status and 17 more with only T20 status.
articles.content: The BCCI will not support Najam Sethi's proposed hybrid model of hosting the Asia Cup wherein four preliminary round and two super four games will be held in Pakistan with India's matches and the fin… [+1851 chars]

articles.title: Meet the lunar rover that will venture to the moon’s south pole - CNN
articles.description: This week, meet the next generation of lunar rovers, glimpse stunning new photos of the solar surface, encounter colorful new species across Asia, learn about an unusual ancient predator, and more.
